pages.text: Abilities are $(l)mana draining$() player buffs and actions. Each ability has their own mana cost, cooldown and number of levels. Most abilities are not limited to The Vault dimension and therefore also work in other dimensions. $(br2)

An ability can be learned or upgraded when enough $(l)Skill Points$() are available. When upgrading an ability, mana costs may increase and cooldown decrease. An Ability can be unlearned using $(l)Regret Points.$() $(br2)Certain Abilities have specializations. Picking a specialization for an ability locks the other specialization and may also limit the use to The Vault dimension only. specializations can be removed with the right $(l)Choice Flask$()
